params._feeRecipient: The address where the rewards are sent
params._operator: The address representing the operator, receiving the rewards

addValidators(uint256,uint256,bytes,byte.details: Only callable by the administrator or the operator address

params._publicKeys: Public keys of the validator, concatenated
params._signatures: Signatures of the validator keys, concatenated

params._admin: Admin in charge of managing operators

removeValidators(uint256,uint256[]).details: Only callable by the administrator or the operator addressThe indexes must be provided sorted in decreasing order, otherwise the method will revertThe operator limit will be set to the lowest deleted key index

params._indexes: The indexes of the keys to remove

setOperatorAddress(uint256,address).details: Only callable by the administrator or the previous operator address

params._newOperatorAddress: The new address of the operator

setOperatorFeeRecipientAddress(uint256,a.details: Only callable by the administrator or the previous operator fee recipient address

params._newOperatorFeeRecipientAddress: The new fee recipient address of the operator

setOperatorLimits(uint256[],uint256[]).details: Only callable by the administratorThe limit cannot exceed the total key count of the operatorThe _indexes and _newLimits must have the same length.Each limit value is applied to the operator index at the same index in the _indexes array.

params._newLimits: The new staking limit of the operators

setOperatorName(uint256,string).details: Only callable by the administrator or the operatorNo name conflict can exist

params._newStatus: The new status of the operator

params._newStoppedValidatorCount: The new stopped validator count of the operator

params._newRiver: New address for the river system

acceptOwnership().notice: Accepts the ownership of the system

addOperator(string,address,address).notice: Adds an operator to the registry

addValidators(uint256,uint256,bytes,byte.notice: Adds new keys for an operator

getOperatorDetails(string).notice: Retrieve the operator details from the operator name

getValidator(uint256,uint256).notice: Get the details of a validator

pickNextValidators(uint256).notice: Retrieve validator keys based on operator statuses

setOperatorAddress(uint256,address).notice: Changes the operator address of an operator

setOperatorFeeRecipientAddress(uint256,a.notice: Changes the operator fee recipient address

setOperatorStoppedValidatorCount(uint256.notice: Changes the operator stopped validator cound

transferOwnership(address).notice: Changes the admin but waits for new admin approval

userdoc.notice: This contract handles the list of operators and their keys
